obs.ontologyAccess
Interface OntologyAccess

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractOntologyAccessTool, BioPortalAccessTool, UmlsAccessTool
public interface OntologyAccess

This interface defines the function that are necessary to access ontologies.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Clement Jonquet

mapStringToLocalConceptIDs

java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> mapStringToLocalConceptIDs(java.lang.String s,
                                                               java.lang.String localOntologyID,
                                                               boolean exactMap)
                                                               throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException
For a given String, returns the set of concepts in the given ontology for which the given String is (i) exactly equal to one of the concept names if the flag is true; (ii) contained into one of the concept names if the flag is false;

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException

                      throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException

OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException

conceptInformation

java.lang.String conceptInformation(java.lang.String localConceptID,
                                    boolean withAllParents,
                                    boolean withAllChildren)
                                    throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException
Returns a String that contains all the information about a concept (GUI function). The 2 flags specify respectively if all the parents and all the children are computed.

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException

getConceptMappings

java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String[]> getConceptMappings(java.lang.String localConceptID,
                                                         java.lang.String localOntologyID)
                                                         throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException,
                                                                OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException
Returns a set of couples [mappedLocalConceptID, mappingType] saying that the given concept is mapped to (according to mappingType) mappedLocalConceptID in the given ontology. The given ontology can be the one in which the given concept is defined (internal mappings).

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException

getOntologyMappings

java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String[]> getOntologyMappings(java.lang.String localOntologyID1,
                                                          java.lang.String localOntologyID2)
                                                          throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException
Returns a set of triplets [localConceptID, mappedLocalConceptID, mappingType] saying that the localConceptID is mapped to (according to mappingType) mappedLocalConceptID localConceptID is in the first given ontology; mappedLocalConceptID is in the second. The 2 given ontologies can be the same (internal mappings). Note: mappings are not assumed to be symetric. Therefore, a call to getOntologyMappings(o1, o2) may returned different result than getOntologyMappings(o2, o1).

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalOntologyIDException

getConceptDirectParents

java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> getConceptDirectParents(java.lang.String localConceptID)
                                                            throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException
For a given concept, returns the set of concept of all the direct parents.

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException

getConceptDirectChildren

java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> getConceptDirectChildren(java.lang.String localConceptID)
                                                             throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException
For a given concept, returns the set of concept of all the direct children.

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException

getConceptParents

java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getConceptParents(java.lang.String localConceptID)
                                                                          throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException
For a given concept, returns a hashtable that represents the set of concepts of all the parents (recursively to the ontology root). The hashtable keys are the localConceptID and the values are the level in the hierarchy (parents=1, grand-parents=2, ...). If there are several paths to the root with different levels, we keep the shortest level for a concept.

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException

getConceptChildren

java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getConceptChildren(java.lang.String localConceptID)
                                                                           throws OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException
For a given concept, returns a hashtable that represents the set of concepts of all the children (recursively to the leaves). The hashtable keys are the localConceptID and the values are the level in the hierarchy (child=1, grand-child=2, ...). If there are several path to the same leave with different levels, we keep the shortest level for a concept.

Throws:
OntologyAccess.NonValidLocalConceptIDException
